titles.title: Commending the Government of Japan for its current policy against currency manipulation and encouraging the Government of Japan to continue in this policy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: International monetary system and foreign exchange

bill.summary: 11/19/2009--Introduced. Commends the Government of Japan for its reversal in policy regarding currency manipulation. Encourages it to maintain this new policy, thereby conforming to its responsibilities as a member of the International Monetary Fund (IMF) and the World Trade Organization (WTO), as well as promoting free and fair international trade.
